price: 16. Et c’est ainsi que Nous l’avons fait descendre (en révélation) en versets bien clairs. Allah guide qui Il veut.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
